text: Bharucha may refer to *Roshan Khursheed Bharucha, Pakistani politician *Chitra Bharucha, Former vice chairman of the BBC Trust. *Jamshed Bharucha, President of Cooper Union. *Jimmy Bharucha, Sri Lankan Broadcaster. *Nushrat Bharucha, Indian film actress. *Sam Piroj Bharucha, 30th Chief Justice of India.
title: Bharucha
